evidence.claim: TruVita Wellness employs HIPAA compliance in its services to ensure the protection of health information.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for health data transfer and interoperability.
Their platform emphasizes reliable data handling in accordance with health regulations and standards.
TruVita's architecture is designed to support integrations aligning with healthcare standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of using X12 or EDI integration in their services or offerings.
